page.title: 06Recreation in Sprowston
page.content: The manager of Sprowston Garden Centre,which covers 4\ acres of land and employs 26 people including 2 on Y.T.S., believes that gardening is now Britian's No 1. leisure activity. Each week between 5000 and 6000 people visit this Garden Centre.They are particularly busy on Saturday and Sunday and the plants and shrubs purchased are usually a joint decision of the couples. There has been a steady increase in the sales at the Centre, although over the past 3 years the rate of increase has slowed down. This year ,however, many plants were purchased in the early Summer to replace those which were lost during the very hard winter. People in the Sprowston area are becoming more knowledgeable about plants,probably due to the excellent televison progammes and the increase
